# HUD::SET_BLIP_ROTATION_WITH_FLOAT

## Summary
Same as SET_BLIP_ROTATION, but with floating point accuracy!

## Parameters
* **BLIP_INDEX** blip
* **FLOAT** degrees

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Does not require whole number/integer rotations.
